result.execSummary:
The defendant was charged with both OWI (2nd w/ Passenger < 16 Yrs Old) and Operating w/PAC-Passenger < 16 Yrs (3rd). The defendant was found guilty of OWI (2nd w/ Passenger < 16 Yrs Old) and the other charge, Operating w/PAC-Passenger < 16 Yrs (3rd) was dismissed by the court.

  • Kip R. Olson was found guilty of OWI (2nd w/ Passenger < 16 Yrs Old), an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 346.63(1)(a).
  • Kip R. Olson was found guilty of Operating While Revoked (Rev due to alc/contr subst/refusal), an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 343.44(1)(b).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt:
Defendant, Kip R. Olson appeared with Attorney Martin Jarvis.  Attorney Thomas H Frost appeared for the State.  Court calls case and appearaces  Atty Jarvis speaks to the court.   Court speaks to the parties. 
State makes a motion to amend to OWI 2nd w/minor child. Motion is granted. 
Court speaks to Mr. Olson regarding his plea questionaire and waiver of rights form.  Court finds the def. freely and knowingly waives his rights. Court finds there is a factual basis. Atty Jarvis speaks to the court.  Mr. Olson speaks to the court. 
Count 1-Def. pleas guilty, court accepts plea and finds the def. guilty.  
Count 2- Def. pleas guilty, court accepts plea and finds the def. guilty

Sentencing- 20 Days county jail. $1, 946.00 DL Revoked for 14 months
1 Day credit-Entitled of Huber & Good time, Would like to serve time in Barron County if it does not cost Washburn County any money.  Start date on or before September 25th start date.   AODA-VIP and IID is required. 
Count 2-  $200.50
